description:
When a weekend just isn’t enough. Gregory refined the carrying system on the high-capacity Baltoro 75 to make long trips more comfortable. The FreeFloat A3 (Automatic Angle Adjust) chassis adjusts the shoulder harness and hipbelt load panels independently to accommodate your changing body angles. The design lets you keep your balance and centre of gravity across varying terrain. Highly water-resistant hipbelt pockets hold electronics or other small essentials.

  • Steel wire frame is wishbone-shaped to channel the load to the centre and lumbar regions
  • AirCushion Foamless backpanel keeps air flowing and eliminates pressure points
  • Bottom sleeping bag compartment has a removable internal divider
  • Twin side-mounted water bottle holsters are canted for easy access and stow away when not needed
  • Lots of pockets on the front, sides and lid keep you organized
  • Removable shockcord loops hold ice axes or trekking poles
  • Removable, adjustable straps attach at multiple points for lashing on sleeping pads
  • Maximum recommended cargo weight is 25kg
name: Gregory Baltoro 75 Backpack - Unisex
